articles.title: New Guidelines To Treat Childhood Obesity Released by AAP - Toowoomba Chronicle
articles.description: The new guidelines are the first to be released by the American Academy of Pediatrics (AAP) in 15 years. The AAP issued the guidelines on Jan. 9 as childhood obesity rates continue to increase.
